```{r}
#| error: TRUE
devtools::load_all()

# Test data
x <- .DefaultDataDual()
x

# Empty data
DataDual(doseGrid = x@doseGrid)

# No change
knit_print(x, full_grid = FALSE)

# Full grid
knit_print(x, full_grid = TRUE, summarise = "dose")


# Formatted
knit_print(
  x,
  full_grid = FALSE,
  digits = c(0, 0, 1, NA, 3),
  format_func = function(x) {
    kable_styling(x, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
  }
)

# Summarised by dose
knit_print(x, full_grid = FALSE, summarise = "dose")

# Summarised by cohort and formatted
knit_print(
  x,
  full_grid = FALSE,
  summarise = "cohort",
  format_func = function(x) {
    kable_styling(x, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
  }
)

```
